}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[AzureWave AW-NH630]] (H) (LGA) 1T1R 802.11bgn (150Mbps) :WLAN Combo Module SoftAP, SDIO, GSPI and USB interfaces
===Features=== * USB 3.0 client, FireWire 800, eSATA * 500GB storage capacity, 8MB cache * Hard drive: ''Seagate Momentus'' 5400 * WiFi: 1T1R N150 [[AzureWave]] AW-NH630 * Battery: Li-ion, 3.7V, 2800mAh (~7h/24h)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
